name: Counter Aim: Brutal Offensive
description:
Online shooter with beautiful graphics, interesting confrontation with friends with more than 4 modes and more than 3 maps. More than 11 types of weapons, realistic recoil, server from 2 to 20 people, also an interesting mode with 2 types of vehicles, this is a tank and an armored vehicle, this is not all, the rest will be seen in the game. Good luck!

pc and mobile supported
